Research Priority: PRISMA+ - Precision Physics, Fundamental Interactions and Structure of Matter
Description: PRISMA+ makes unique contributions to the investigation of the deep open questions surrounding the validity of the standard model of particle physics. PRISMA+ scientists search for new particles and forces.
Key terms (German): experimentelle Teilchenphysik; theoretische Teilchenphysik; Kernphysik; Hochenergieteilchenphysik; Neutrinophysik; theoretische Beschleunigerphysik
Key terms (Englisch): experimental particle physics; theoretical particle physics; nuclear physics; high-energy particle physics; neutrino physics; theoretical collider physics

Research Priority: Heavy ion physics and materials research
Description: Modeling of characteristics of micro- up to macro-scales, development of modern accelerator and detector designs for FAIR as well as transfer of the developed technologies to application-oriented research areas. Investigation of theoretical concepts and numerical methods.
Research Areas: Informatics, System and Electrical Engineering; Materials Science and Engineering; Physics
Key terms (German): Beschleunigerentwicklung; Quantenchromodynamik (QCD); Schwerionen; Schwerionenreaktionen; Detektorentwicklung; Computersimulationen; Materialien
Key terms (Englisch): accelerator development; quantum chromodynamic (QCD); heavy ions; heavy ion reactions; detector development; computer simulations; materials

Research Priority: KIT Center Elementary Particle and Astroparticle Physics (KCETA)
Description: KCETA conducts research in large-scale international projects and networks in many areas of astroparticle and particle physics, develops and builds detectors and accelerators, and uses quantum technologies and big data science to elucidate the connections between quarks and the cosmos.
Key terms (German): dunkle Materie; Neutrinophysik; Teilchenphysik; Hochenergieastrophysik; Detektortechnik; Beschleunigertechnik; Informationstechnik (IT)
Key terms (Englisch): dark matter; neutrino physics; particle physics; high-energy astrophysics; detector technology; accelerator technology; information technology (IT)

Research Priority: Cluster of Excellence Munich-Centre for Advanced Photonics MAP
Description: Physical, chemical, biological and medical departments research new coherent light sources and develop secondary light-driven particle sources with unprecedented properties. Results are amongst other things sub-femtosecond control of the electromagnetic field in few-cycle light pulses.
Key terms (German): Hochfeldphysik; Laseranwendungen; Laser-Plasma-Beschleunigung; lasergetriebene Strahlungsquellen; Röntgenstrahlung; Strahlentherapie; biomedizinische Bildgebung; Elektronendynamik; Moleküldynamik; Biomoleküle; Photonik; Biophotonik
Key terms (Englisch): high-field physics; laser applications; laser plasma acceleration; laser-driven radiation sources; x-ray; radiotherapy; biomedical imaging; electron dynamics; molecular dynamics; biomolecules; photonics; biophotonics
